title: Firefox Sync and Save Data Login Issue after Firefox 115 Update
content:
After the recent Firefox 115 update, I tried to sync my tabs and access the mobile tabs in my PC but it was not working... It was showing an old synced tab list.. I tried multiple times and nothing happened... So I logged out of my account and logged in again but this time I couldn't login... So I uninstalled my Firefox app and installed it again but it still didn't work.

What happens is... I use the login button in sync feature... It shows to scan a barcode from pc or through email (i tried both)... I use my PC to login in... It logs in but as soon as I go back or open the firefox app again... It goes back to the same login again mode... I have tried it multiple times... This is all shown in the pictures given below.

Whatâ€™s causing this and how do I solve it? Some feedback will be helpful as I can't use my mobile and PC properly... All the addons, preference are gone for now.
creator: Imsar53

title: new window opening small but maximized somehow
content: when i open a new session, the window is always tiny, but the little icon in the upper right indicates that the window is maximized. when i click it once then it acts as its minimized, and i have to click a second time to maximize it for reals. it also does not remember the last size i set the window. doesnt happen if i open an additional window, only upon startup
